body: Forgot to metion Dawn, Lucas and Barry are 12 as well

@Rickachu according to Bulbapedia  canonically the only protagonists/rivals in Pokemon older than 12 are Red(20), Blue(20), Green/Leaf(20) Ethan(17), Kris/Lyra(17) Silver(16-17) May(13-15), Brendan(13-15), Hilbert(14BW-16BW2), Hilda(14BW-16BW2), Bianca(14BW-16BW2) and Cheren(14BW-16BW2) Nate, Hugh, Rosa, Calem and Serena are all 12 while Elio and Selene(Sun and Moon) are both 11 Victor Gloria and Hop's ages have yet to be revealed granted most of these ages are only stated in the Pokemon adventures manga but May, Brendan, Hilbert and Hilda's in game ages have been addressed, as for the Let's Go trio of Chase, Elaine and Trace it's probably safe to assume they are indeed 10-11
